CoveragePattern.ExistenceScript: return (Dwelling_HOE.HOPolicyType == typekey.HOPolicyType_HOE.TC_HO3)? ExistenceType.TC_ELECTABLE : (Dwelling_HOE.HOPolicyType == typekey.HOPolicyType_HOE.TC_HO4 || Dwelling_HOE.HOPolicyType == typekey.HOPolicyType_HOE.TC_HO6 || (Dwelling_HOE.HOPolicyType == typekey.HOPolicyType_HOE.TC_DP3_EXT && Dwelling_HOE.ResidenceType == typekey.ResidenceType_HOE.TC_CONDO) ) ? ExistenceType.TC_REQUIRED: ExistenceType.TC_ELECTABLE
